name: Mystikat
subtitle: Healing Support
statsDescription: Mystikat has the highest base CON (14) for excellent stamina capacity and regeneration, paired with high SPECIAL (13) for powerful healing scaling. Low STR and DEX mean lower damage and attack speed, but the focus is on survivability rather than offense.

content.name: Vital Bloom!
content.cost: Cost: 3 Stamina | Duration: 3 Attacks | Cooldown: None (Manual Only)
content.description: A unique healing ability with dual mechanics: passive healing on every hit, and an active 3-attack sequence that drains HP twice before delivering a powerful heal on the third hit.

items: Passive: Every hit heals you for 1-3 HP (scales with SPECIAL)
Active (Manual): Triggers a 3-attack drain/heal sequence
Attacks 1-2: Drain ~4-10% of your max HP per attack
Attack 3: Heal ~16-29% of your max HP
Stamina Cost: 3 stamina to activate sequence

content.text: Mystikat provides two independent healing sources. The passive healing triggers on every successful hit regardless of whether Vital Bloom is active, providing consistent sustain. The active ability must be manually triggered and requires landing 3 consecutive hits to complete the sequence.

items: Step 1 - Drain Phase: Takes ~4-10% of your max HP as damage
Step 2 - Drain Phase: Takes ~4-10% of your max HP as damage
Step 3 - Healing Phase: Heals ~16-29% of your max HP (more than double the drain)

content.text: Mystikat's passive healing works automatically, but Vital Bloom's active sequence requires:

items: Manual Activation: Must press the Vital Bloom button (no auto-activation)
Sufficient Stamina: Must have at least 3 stamina
Companion Awake: Companion must not be sleeping
Three Consecutive Hits: Must land 3 hits to complete the sequence

content.text: Important: If you miss an attack or the enemy dies mid-sequence, the drain/heal cycle is interrupted and resets. The HP drained will not be recovered unless you complete the full 3-attack sequence.

The Vital Bloom sequence tracks charges (0, 1, 2). After the 3rd attack heals you, the sequence automatically deactivates and resets to 0 charges. You must manually reactivate it to start another drain/heal cycle. There is no cooldown‚Äîyou can immediately reactivate after completing a sequence if you have 3 stamina available.
Each STR point increases damage by 2.0%. While Mystikat isn't a damage dealer, STR still helps with faster enemy kills. The base multiplier is 0.9 (90% of base damage).

content.text: Each DEX point increases attack speed by 0.32% and hit chance by 0.6%. More attacks means more passive healing triggers and faster completion of Vital Bloom sequences.

Each 5 CON points grants +1 max stamina. With base CON=14 and SPECIAL=13, Mystikat starts with 9 stamina (3 + 3 + 3). CON also dramatically improves stamina regeneration speed, allowing more Vital Bloom sequences.
With base LUCK=9, Mystikat starts with 5.6% crit chance and 240% crit damage. Each LUCK point adds 0.20% crit chance and 3.375% crit damage, providing solid scaling for a healing companion.

content.text: SPECIAL is Mystikat's most important stat. Every 4 SPECIAL grants +1 max stamina. Each point increases passive healing by ~0.05 HP (plus a small % of max HP), and boosts drain/heal amounts by 1.4%.

The passive healing is always active and requires no management. With higher DEX, you'll heal more frequently due to faster attacks. This passive sustain alone can keep you alive through many zones without ever using Vital Bloom.

items: Your HP is below 70% and you need a burst heal
Fighting tough enemies or bosses where the net +9.5 HP gain matters
You have 3+ stamina available and won't need it for other companions
The enemy will survive all 3 hits (don't waste it on low-HP enemies)

content.text: The drain phase takes approximately 20% of your max HP over 2 attacks before healing ~29% back on the 3rd. If you're at low HP, using Vital Bloom is risky‚Äîthe drain could kill you before the heal lands. Always ensure you can survive 2 drains before activating.

With 9 base stamina and 3 stamina cost per sequence, you can perform 3 full Vital Bloom cycles before needing rest. Higher CON builds can maintain near-permanent uptime. Don't spam it‚Äîsave stamina for when you actually need healing.

Mystikat excels in extended boss fights. The passive healing keeps you alive while the active sequences provide burst healing to recover from damage spikes. Time your Vital Bloom activations to complete the sequence before major boss mechanics hit.

content.description: Balance SPECIAL with high CON for maximum stamina capacity and near-instant regeneration. This build can use Vital Bloom constantly without running out of stamina, providing a steady stream of healing cycles. Excellent for longer fights where you need sustained healing output over time.
